channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Steel stocks among rare gainers after tariffs, but retaliation could take a bite
item.description: Trump’s tariffs on Mexico and Canada are giving a boost to steelmaker stocks, but retaliatory tariffs could reduce the potential benefits.

item.title: FDX, Norfolk Southern, CSX Canadian Pacific downgraded on tariff woes
item.description: Higher prices will reduce demand for goods and cool the economy, which in turn impacts the transportation sector.

item.title: Modelo importer Constellation Brands gets a downgrade from Piper Sandler on U.S. tariffs
item.description: Shares were more than 5% lower before the opening bell on Monday.

item.title: Here are the automakers hit hardest by the tariffs on Mexico and Canada
item.description: Shares of the Big Three automakers slumped on Monday in premarket trade as the impact of 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico hit the companies hard.
